pageContent: Objective: To study the survival rate of patients without biochemical recurrence according to the Stuttgart and Phoenix criteria in terms of their correlation with four different PSA nadir values as predictors of clinical recurrence in patients with localized prostate cancer who underwent total HIFU prostate ablation.

metaData.source:
[HIFU for prostate cancer in patients with a history of severe colorectal disease]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21943658/
